^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This allows additional configuring of the AMI AccountService Configurations.
^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.longDescription: This allows additional configuring of the AMI AccountService Configurations.

CACertificateId.description: Indicates the certificate id of root CA certificate used for LDAP Configuration.
CACertificateId.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the certificate id of root CA certificate used for LDAP Configuration.

CertificateId.description: Indicates the certificate id of certificate key used for LDAP Configuration.
CertificateId.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the certificate id of certificate key used for LDAP Configuration.

CommonNameType.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the CommonNameType.

DomainControllerServerAddr1.description: Indicates the first Domain Controller Server Address of the Active Directory Configuration.
DomainControllerServerAddr1.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the first Domain Controller Server Address of the Active Directory Configuration , which is mandatory.

DomainControllerServerAddr2.description: Indicates the second Domain Controller Server Address of the Active Directory Configuration if any.
DomainControllerServerAddr2.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the second Domain Controller Server Address of the Active Directory Configuration if any.

DomainControllerServerAddr3.description: Indicates the third Domain Controller Server Address of the Active Directory Configuration if any.
DomainControllerServerAddr3.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the third Domain Controller Server Address of the Active Directory if any.

DomainName.description: Indicates the DomainName of the Active Directory Configuration.
DomainName.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the DomainName of the Active Directory Configuration.

EncryptionType.description: Indicates the Encryption Type of the LDAP Configuration.
EncryptionType.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the Encryption Type of the LDAP Configuration.

GroupID.description: Indicates the Group ID of the Active Directory Role Settings.
GroupID.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the Group ID of the Active Directory Role Settings.

KVMAccess.description: Indicates the KVM access privilege for the given LDAP/ActiveDirectory user with this GroupID/RoleID.
KVMAccess.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the KVM access privilege for the given LDAP/ActiveDirectory user with this GroupID/RoleID.

RoleID.description: Specifies the ID of the Role.
RoleID.longDescription: The value of this property Specifies the ID of the Role and it ranges from 1 to 5.

VMediaAccess.description: Indicates the VMedia acesss privilege for the given LDAP/ActiveDirectory user with this GroupID/RoleID.
VMediaAccess.longDescription: The value of this string shall represent the VMedia access privilege for the given LDAP/ActiveDirectory user with this GroupID/RoleID.

enumDescriptions.SSL: Indicates the Encryption Type used for LDAP Configuration is SSL
enumDescriptions.StartTLS: Indicates the Encryption Type used for LDAP Configuration is StartTLS
